places_to_visit.name: Male Atoll
places_to_visit.description: Male Atoll is the capital atoll of the Maldives and features vibrant markets, historical mosques, and stunning marine life. The area provides insight into local culture and offers beautiful beaches.

places_to_visit.name: Baa Atoll
places_to_visit.description: Baa Atoll is renowned for its stunning coral reefs and rich marine biodiversity. It’s a UNESCO Biosphere Reserve and is perfect for snorkeling and diving.

places_to_visit.name: Sun Siyam Iru Fushi
places_to_visit.description: Sun Siyam Iru Fushi is a luxury resort located in the Noonu Atoll. It offers overwater villas, pristine beaches, and various water sports activities.

places_to_visit.name: Dhigurah Island
places_to_visit.description: Dhigurah Island is known for its long sandy beach and whale shark sightings. It’s a quieter spot for those wanting to experience local life and explore marine life.

places_to_visit.name: Fihalhohi Island
places_to_visit.description: Fihalhohi Island offers beautiful white-sand beaches and clear waters. It’s a great place for relaxation and underwater activities, including snorkeling and diving.

activities: Explore Male Atoll and its local markets
Snorkel or dive in Baa Atoll
Relax in luxury at Sun Siyam Iru Fushi
Spot whale sharks at Dhigurah Island
Enjoy beach activities at Fihalhohi Island
tips_and_tricks: Book resort activities and excursions in advance.
Pack light, breathable clothing and swimwear.
Bring sunscreen and insect repellent for protection.
